name: Twirl! (Gamejam Prototype)
description:
Twirl upon your enemies!

How to play:

-Click on the knight, then click in the yellow zone where you want to release him.

-Kill all the enemies.

-(The game is bugged, you might need to Alt+F4 a the last level. Sorryyyyy.)

Twirl! Is a prototype made during the One Button GameJam (https://itch.io/jam/one-button-game).

I'm gonna create a full version later, stay tuned!

All asset are free and most of them can be find hire! https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii
